pullRequest.title: 76 diet
pullRequest.bodyText: This reduces the uberjar size by about 30MB (to about 40MB).

commit.message: [#76] removed graphstream, jgrapht, sqlite from cqengine

nodes.bodyText: Maybe you could choose a different name for your Color class... I don't know about best practice here, but I personally don't like using fully qualified names (java.awt.Color), if it can be avoided.
You can also remove the imports of Map and HashMap.
